title: shrI rAman
sahitya:
shrI rAman ravikula sOman raNadhIran shrI raghuvIran avanE enadu tuNai


anupallavi

  ArAvamudan amarar tuyar dhIra bhuviyil dasharatha kumAran
 enavavataritta udAra caritan oru tAraviratan jaya


caraNam    mAdhark-kaNikalam ena varu sItApati vana gamana vinOdan munNijana hrdayA
 mOda nidhAnan vAtAtmaja mrdukara dhrDha pAdan vanaja vadanan sAkEta
 nagara jana hrdaya sAdhaka-vabinnava nIrada sundaran
